review: Past I have visited on many places but this is the best ever ,If you want peace and nature,from this place you can reach many best places,lakes,waterfall ,visit this place.....Dr Kavindra verma (Lko).
name: Dr. Kavindra Verma

review: Kotchula hill estate is a village homestay near Srinagar garhwal.run by a couple the estate offers traditional village living.if you love to get a touch of village life this is the place to relax and be with yourself.food offered is ok.
name: sagarkawra
